abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance by baritone Paulo Szot at Feinstein’s/54 Below.

headline.print_headline: Rekindling the Flames of the Traditional Broadway Romance
headline.main: Review: Paulo Szot, Rekindling the Flames of the Traditional Broadway Romance

snippet: Mr. Szot has brought his baritone to Feinstein’s/54 Below, where his performance of classic tunes evokes the virility of the old-fashioned leading man.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Szot has brought his baritone to Feinstein’s/54 Below, where his performance of classic tunes evokes the virility of the old-fashioned leading man.
